content: प्रशांत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Calmed, tranquillized, composed. {@--2@} Calm, serene, quiet, sedate, still; अहो प्रशांतरमणीयतोद्यानस्य. {@--3@} Tamed, subdued, quelled. {@--4@} Ended, ceased, over; तत्सर्वमेकपद एव मम प्रशांतं <ls>Māl. 9. 36</ls>; प्रशांतमस्त्रं <ls>U. 6</ls> ‘ceased to work or withdrawn.’ {@--5@} Dead, deceased; (see शम् with प्र).
